description: Axel Fontaine, CEO of Boxfuse, joins Voxxed directly from his packed-out Devoxx Poland session on Immutable Infrastructure: Rise of the Machine Images. It proved a hot topic at the conference with attendees lining the aisles.  Axel discusses the brave new cloud world, how instances become disposable, where individual machines are something you create and throw away, the impact of that on persistent data, and how developers mindset may need to change.
short_description: Axel Fontaine, CEO of Boxfuse, joins Voxxed directly from his packed-out Devoxx Poland session on Immutable Infrastructure: Rise
title: How will Immutable Infrastructure change our way of working?
